data.actual_result: The screen doesn't change the name to appear valid until you reload the screen.
data.expected_result: The screen should update the name when it's invalid.
data.short_description: Attempting to submit an invalid emote name makes the invalid name remain until you re-open the screen.
data.steps_to_repro: - Navigate to Server Settings > Emoji. - Upload an emote or have an emote already added. - Rename the emoji to one character, or without a name at all. - Observe the name stay the same as you submitted. - Tap "Back" then tap "Emoji" again.
